text: The Darkness are a British rock band formed in Lowestoft in 2000. == Band members == * Justin Hawkins - lead vocals, rhythm guitar (2000-present) * Dan Hawkins - lead guitar, backing vocals (2000-present) * Frankie Poullain - bass, backing vocals (2000-present) * Rufus Tiger Taylor - drums, backing vocals (2015-present) == Influences == The Darkness' influences include Queen, Kiss, Aerosmith, Billy Squier, David Bowie, Def Leppard, Guns N' Roses, Mott the Hoople, Saxon, Spinal Tap, The Cult, Judas Priest, The Cherry Bombz, Alice Cooper, Boston, Van Halen, Gary Glitter, Led Zeppelin, New York Dolls, Slade, The Sweet and Thin Lizzy. == Discography == == References == == Other websites == * * * * Category:1999 establishments in England Category:Brit Award winners Category:English hard rock bands Category:English heavy metal bands Category:Glam metal bands Category:Musical groups established in 1999
title: The Darkness (band)
